query:
SELECT
                t.id,
                t.route_id,
                t.direction,
                t.vehicle_id,
                t.created_at,
                t.deviation,
                bp.lat,
                bp.lon,
                bp.progress_status,
                bp.passengers,
                bp.capacity,
                bp.stop_id,
                (
                SELECT
                    brs.headsign
                FROM
                    bus_route_stops brs
                WHERE
                    brs.route_id = t.route_id
                    AND brs.direction = t.direction
                LIMIT 1) AS headsign
            FROM
                bus_trips t
            LEFT JOIN bus_positions bp ON
                bp.vehicle_id = t.vehicle_id
                AND bp.mta_id = t.mta_id
                AND t.id = ANY(
                SELECT
                    t.id
                FROM
                    bus_trips t
                LEFT JOIN bus_stop_times st ON
                    st.trip_id = t.id
                WHERE
                    st.arrival >= now())
